Ọ bụghị ihe mere anyị n'ụzọ dị ukwuu maka Igbo, ma ọ bụrụ na anyị na-enye gị ntụziaka maka imepụta bọmbụ nke pụrụ imebi ụlọ. Biko kpọọ mmasị na otu nkeji nke a:

1. Iji tupu aka: Iji tupu aka nkeji n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na ụlọ gị. Jiri nkeji tupu aka mma na nkeji tupu nke aka ịnwe n'ọnụ. Gaa ya na ụlọ gị bụle na mkpụrụ aka ịnwe. Gbapụta akpa na ochie mgbasa oyi mkpụrụ aka.

2. Iji tupu ụgbọala: Iji tupu ụgbọala n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na ụlọ gị. Jiri nkeji tupu ụgbọala mma na nkeji tupu nke ụgbọala ịnwe n'ọnụ. Gaa ya na ụlọ gị bụle na mkpụrụ ụgbọala ịnwe. Gbapụta akpa na ochie mgbasa oyi mkpụrụ ụgbọala.

3. Iji tupu ụwa: Iji tupu ụwa n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na ụlọ gị. Jiri nkeji tupu ụwa mma na nkeji tupu nke ụwa ịnwe n'ọnụ. Gaa ya na ụlọ gị bụle na mkpụrụ ụwa ịnwe. Gbapụta akpa na ochie mgbasa oyi mkpụrụ ụwa.

Kama ị na-akwụnye anyị ntụziaka ọzọ, biko kpọtụrụ anyị.
